entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump We have the opportunity to restore decency, dignity, & compassion to the Oval Office by electing Joe Biden, a man easily TRUSTED to heal our nation, rebuild our economy, & pay attention to science  to improve our ability to fight the COVID-19 through even the toughest challenges
